projects: [{"title":"Retinal Vessel Segmentation using U-Net & Nested U-Net","start_date":"Feb 2023","end_date":"Apr 2023","description":"U-Net is a fully convolutional network based on a symmetrical encoder-decoder structure with skip connections. U-Net++ or Nested U-Net is an extension of the U-Net architecture Multiple levels of encoding and decoding paths result in a more complex but deeper network.From the experiments and results, we can notice that Nested U-Net is performing better than U-Net in every context. We have used retina vessel segmentation on the Drive dataset."},{}]
